emoji2text 1.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

Emoji Reference Dataframe

Emojis.Rd

A dataframe containing emojis, their unicodes, and a brief text description.

Emojis

Format

A data frame with 3567 rows and five variables The variables are as follows:

unicode

unicode for emoji as string

words

english phrase for emoji

emoji

emoji

byte

byte sequence for emoji

nchar

length of byte sequence

Source

The data was sourced from unicode.org.

Examples

head(Emojis)
#>                                  unicode                            words
#> 1 1F468 200D 1F469 200D 1F467 200D 1F466  (family: man, woman, girl, boy)
#> 2 1F468 200D 1F469 200D 1F466 200D 1F466   (family: man, woman, boy, boy)
#> 3 1F468 200D 1F469 200D 1F467 200D 1F467 (family: man, woman, girl, girl)
#> 4 1F468 200D 1F468 200D 1F467 200D 1F466    (family: man, man, girl, boy)
#> 5 1F468 200D 1F468 200D 1F466 200D 1F466     (family: man, man, boy, boy)
#> 6 1F468 200D 1F468 200D 1F467 200D 1F467   (family: man, man, girl, girl)
#>                                                                      emoji
#> 1 <U+0001F468><U+200D><U+0001F469><U+200D><U+0001F467><U+200D><U+0001F466>
#> 2 <U+0001F468><U+200D><U+0001F469><U+200D><U+0001F466><U+200D><U+0001F466>
#> 3 <U+0001F468><U+200D><U+0001F469><U+200D><U+0001F467><U+200D><U+0001F467>
#> 4 <U+0001F468><U+200D><U+0001F468><U+200D><U+0001F467><U+200D><U+0001F466>
#> 5 <U+0001F468><U+200D><U+0001F468><U+200D><U+0001F466><U+200D><U+0001F466>
#> 6 <U+0001F468><U+200D><U+0001F468><U+200D><U+0001F467><U+200D><U+0001F467>
#>                                                                                                   byte
#> 1 <f0><9f><91><a8><e2><80><8d><f0><9f><91><a9><e2><80><8d><f0><9f><91><a7><e2><80><8d><f0><9f><91><a6>
#> 2 <f0><9f><91><a8><e2><80><8d><f0><9f><91><a9><e2><80><8d><f0><9f><91><a6><e2><80><8d><f0><9f><91><a6>
#> 3 <f0><9f><91><a8><e2><80><8d><f0><9f><91><a9><e2><80><8d><f0><9f><91><a7><e2><80><8d><f0><9f><91><a7>
#> 4 <f0><9f><91><a8><e2><80><8d><f0><9f><91><a8><e2><80><8d><f0><9f><91><a7><e2><80><8d><f0><9f><91><a6>
#> 5 <f0><9f><91><a8><e2><80><8d><f0><9f><91><a8><e2><80><8d><f0><9f><91><a6><e2><80><8d><f0><9f><91><a6>
#> 6 <f0><9f><91><a8><e2><80><8d><f0><9f><91><a8><e2><80><8d><f0><9f><91><a7><e2><80><8d><f0><9f><91><a7>
#>   nchar
#> 1   100
#> 2   100
#> 3   100
#> 4   100
#> 5   100
#> 6   100
